name: SmartShower
tagline: make your morning easier with a optimized shower schedule while saving time and water
body:
make your morning easier with a optimized shower schedule while saving time and water

## Inspiration
SmartShower was inspired by the problem that every day we have to figure out who is going to take a shower and when. Imagine 6 people living in one house...and only a one shower. No one wants a headache due to shower scheduling headaches! We created SmartShower to make scheduling hassle-free, ensure people are mindful of the length of their showers, and apply an internet-of-things solution to an everyday problem we are faced with.

## What it does
SmartShower generates an optimal shower schedule based on the Google Calendars of people who live together. Users access the web application to…
*authorize SmartShower to access their Google Calendar
*configure preferences such as preferred shower time
*set a desired shower length prior to first event of the day
*

Using a raspberry pi microcontroller, we made SmartShower not just a web application but also an internet-of-things device. With the SmartShower device users are…
*informed about current shower status (scheduled, unscheduled)
*given warning indicators regarding amount of time remaining (LED lights, sounds)
*charged money for every minute past the scheduled end time

Warning indicators like LED simulations and playing sounds for when a user only has 1 minute remaining, for example, use behavioral cues to encourage more efficient water usage. The Capital One Nessie API also allowed for us to integrate monetary incentives to further…
